name: The Final Sunset
description:
Help Jerry the Runner escape The Sun in this 64x64 infinite runner game!

Jerry has pissed off The Sun. Jump over rocks and dash to dodge missiles and lasers while The Sun is right behind you! Can you survive The Final Sunset?

The goal is to collect as many flying Sun shards as you can while running away from The Sun!

Can you beat my highscore of 54?

Download the game for better performance.

How to play:

Press ANYTHING to jump

Jump while in air to dash downwords

Dash to roll under big rocks

This game was made in a week for the LOWREZJAM 2022.

Picked theme: The Sun Is Your Enemy.

Updated to version 1.1!

Both soundtracks and art were made by myself.

Headphones recommended!
